entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
